Posts.EditableText:
My first game is finally done, and by done I mean 'it's possible to solve all the puzzles and complete it', which is to say, not actually done, because it still needs debugging, proofreading, playtesting, and finishing the flavor stuff.  But it's complete enough that I'm comfortable announcing it as coming soon, and putting it out there for anyone who'd be interested in being part of the beta test!  It's a quite large adventure/puzzle game with original illustrations and I think once it's polished it's going to be a really fun piece.

Edit: the beta version has been released!  Let me know if you find any bugs and post if you get stuck; it's hard for me to gauge how hard the puzzles are!

[url:3vi67yyr]http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/yga06kzqtku8cn8vfgjt2a/whitefield-academy-of-witchcraft[/url:3vi67yyr]
